His first book Your Erroneous Zones (1976) is one of the best-selling books of all time, with an estimated 35 million copies sold. ==Other websites== *The Official Dr. Wayne Dyer Website *Wayne Dyer On Hayhouse Radio Category:1940 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from leukemia Category:Writers from Hawaii Category:Businesspeople from Hawaii Category:Businesspeople from Detroit Category:People from Maui Category:Writers from Detroit
